Package ch.usi.inf.lidr.selection

Interface Summary
ResourceSelection An interface for small-document (SD) approaches to resource selection.
 

Class Summary
AbstractResourceSelection An abstract implementation of SD resource selection.
CiSS Collection-integral Source Selection (CiSS) works as follows: A user's query is submitted to CSI. The retrieved documents are assigned to resources from which they originated.
CiSSApprox CiSS resource selection, where only the score of the top document from each resource is taken into account: 1/2 * exp(doc_score_top) * log(result_length * |resource_size|/|sample_size|)
CRCSExp The exponential version of the CRCS resource selection technique for each document in the top-L increases the score of a corresponding resource by exp^(-beta * doc_rank_sample).
CRCSLinear The linear version of the CRCS resource selection technique for each document in the top-L increases the score of a corresponding resource by top_L - doc_rank_sample.
GAVGLog The geometric average blog distillation method proposed by Seo and Croft and used for distributed retrieval by Arguello et al.
ReDDE ReDDE resource selection, the first SD technique.
ReDDETop ReDDE.top resource selection technique for each document in the top-L increases the score of a corresponding resource by the document relevance score.
Resource A resource representation that is used in resource selection methods.
SUSHI For each resource SUSHI learns the transformation function from a document complete rank to a document centralized score: score_c = f(rank_complete).
SUSHI.Regression An abstract class that performs regression of the type y = a * f(x) + b, where the function f should be overridden by subclasses.
